name: Basically Awesome Destruction
description:
This game was made in a week for Weekly Jam Game 130

The theme was "Dying is awarded" and the way I make a game based on this is when your batteries die, you are awarded with the parts you found on your adventure.

THIS GAME IS BEST IN FULL SCREEN

INFO

Basically Awesome Destruction is a physics based, adventure, creative builder where you collect parts, build creations and explode, a lot.

HOW TO PLAY

You start with a pile of parts and you need to make a simple creation in order to find more parts,  every creation must have:

  • The mainframe
  • A battery

You can press R while building to rotate parts

Once a part is placed on a creation, if it has configurable keys you can right click on it while building to change the key(s) it uses.

NOTE: ONLY LETTERS WORK CURRENTLY

TIPS WARNING THIS CONTAINS MINOR SPOILERS FOR PARTS AND/OR FEATURES IN THE GAME

Wheels require an engine to run, engines consume power from the battery.

If you run out of battery you will explode and lose control of your creation, keep track of your battery when exploring.

You will find bubbles containing parts scattered around the map.
